description: At least six people were killed after heavy rain flooded tents and collapsed homes sheltering displaced Gazan families.
title: Displaced Palestinians weather deadly winds, extreme cold in tents

description: The blackout comes as President Yoweri Museveni, criticised for cracking down on opponents, vies for his seventh term.
title: Uganda cuts internet days before presidential election

description: US president issues latest threat to midwestern state, where protests have continued after ICE agent killed woman.
title: ‘Day of reckoning, retribution’ coming to Minnesota amid ICE outrage: Trump

description: “Greenland will not be part of the USA," the territory’s prime minister said.
title: ‘Greenland will not be part of the USA,’ territory’s PM asserts

description: The Syrian army has declared a rural area east of Aleppo a “closed military zone” amid fears of renewed clashes.
title: Syrian army declares military zones in rural Aleppo as SDF destroys bridges

description: Host nation Morocco chase their dream of winning AFCON on home soil against heavyweights Nigeria in Semifinal 2.
title: Nigeria vs Morocco: AFCON semifinal – team news, start time and lineups
